WorkItem.ClosedComment: This has been made obsolete by WoW 3.0
WorkItem.Description:
There are currently quite a few items that are missing the +spell damage from +healing.
Â 
The main ones are quite a few enchants (and you cant edit them in via the EnchantCache.xml, because the loading code overwrites your changes with the built in data), plus it would be nice to have at least the gems edited to include it.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Spell Damage missing for Healing items

Comments.Message: On items, you can refresh data on them to have them update. If you can post a list of enchants, I'll take a look at them. You can edit them in your EnchantCache as long as you change the name.
Royal Shadowsong Amethyst has this problem.  It's 11 healing, 4 damage and 2 mp5, but it's only listed as 11 healing 2 mp5.
I have the same problem with the socket bonus "+x Spell Damage and Healing". You can try with Crystalweave Bracers (32655), Fury of the Ursine (33285) or Bindings of Raging Fire (34697) !
